history.proof: intros d0 d1 H0 H1. unfold DTA_ref_ok, inter. qsimpl time: 1 use: inter,dta_ref_ok_check_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: inter,dta_ref_ok_check_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: inter,dta_ref_ok_check_correct. srun best use: preDTA_produit_ref_ok.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : DTA H0 : DTA_ref_ok d0 H1 : DTA_ref_ok d1 Unable to unify "dta_ref_ok_check (inter d0 d1) = true" with "match match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true" on hypothesis of type "preDTA_ref_ok p".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true" on hypothesis of type "preDTA_ref_ok p0".

original: intros d0 d1 H0 H1. unfold DTA_ref_ok, inter. intros. apply (dta_ref_ok_check_correct (inter d0 d1)). apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H0. apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H1. unfold dta_ref_ok_check. reflexivity.
